query.statement:
SELECT DISTINCT M53.BUDAT AS BUDAT , M31.REQDATE AS REQDATE , M53.GUBN AS GUBN , COALESCE(M53.SE_NO,'') AS SE_NO , M53.PSPID AS PSPID , M53.MATNR AS MATNR , M53.POSID AS POSID , M53.LGORT AS LGORT , COALESCE(M53.SE_NO2,'') AS SE_NO2 , M53.REQNR AS REQNR , M53.REQITEM AS REQITEM , CS121.CS121_SPT AS SPT , SAPHEE.RTRIM_2BYTE(SAPHEE.GET_VENDER_NAME(M53.MANDT, M53.LGORT)) AS LGORT1 , RTRIM(M11.MATNR_NM) AS MATNR_NM , RTRIM(M11.MAKTX) AS MAKTX --, CASE WHEN VALUE(M31.INSMSNO,'') = '' THEN Q8.INSMSNO ELSE M31.INSMSNO END AS INSMSNO , COALESCE(M31.INSMSNO,'') AS INSMSNO FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT053 AS M53 LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST121 AS CS121 ON CS121.MANDT=M53.MANDT AND CS121.CS121_UPN=M53.PSPID AND CS121.CS121_CST = '' LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT011 AS M11 ON M53.MANDT = M11.MANDT AND M53.MATNR = M11.MATNR --AND M11.MTART='ROH' LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT031 AS M31 ON M31.MANDT = M53.MANDT AND M31.REQNR = M53.REQNR AND M31.REQITEM = M53.REQITEM -- LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZQMT008 AS Q8 ON Q8.MANDT = M53.MANDT -- AND Q8.REQNR = M53.REQNR -- AND Q8.REQITEM = M53.REQITEM WHERE M53.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND M53.REQNR <> '' AND M53.REQITEM <> ''
-- AND M53.BUDAT BETWEEN #BUDAT_FM# AND #BUDAT_TO# AND M31.REQDATE BETWEEN #BUDAT_FM# AND #BUDAT_TO#
AND M53.MATNR LIKE #MATNR# ||'%'
AND UCASE(M53.SE_NO) LIKE #SE_NO# ||'%'
AND UCASE(M31.INSMSNO) LIKE #SE_NO2# ||'%'
AND M53.POSID LIKE #POSID# ||'%'
AND M53.LGORT = #CB3#
AND M53.LGORT IN (SELECT M005.LGORT FROM SAPHEE.ZWBT010 B010, SAPHEE.ZMMT005 M005 WHERE B010.MANDT = M005.MANDT AND B010.LIFNR = M005.LIFNR AND B010.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND B010.BSU_PM = #G_USER_ID#)
AND M53.LGORT IN (SELECT MM005.LGORT FROM SAPHEE.ZWBT010 B010, SAPHEE.ZMMT005 MM005 WHERE B010.MANDT = MM005.MANDT AND B010.LIFNR = MM005.LIFNR AND B010.MANDT= #G_MANDT# AND B010.VKGRP= #CB2#)
AND M53.LGORT IN (SELECT LGORT FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT005 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND PERNR = #CB2#)
AND M53.LGORT IN (SELECT MM005.LGORT FROM SAPHEE.ZWBT010 B010, SAPHEE.ZMMT005 MM005 WHERE B010.MANDT = MM005.MANDT AND B010.LIFNR = MM005.LIFNR AND B010.MANDT= #G_MANDT# AND B010.VKGRP= #CB2#)
--===============================
AND M53.LGORT IN (SELECT MM005.LGORT FROM SAPHEE.ZWBT010 B010, SAPHEE.ZMMT005 MM005 WHERE B010.MANDT = MM005.MANDT AND B010.LIFNR = MM005.LIFNR AND B010.MANDT= #G_MANDT# AND SUBSTR(B010.VKGRP,1,2) = SUBSTR(#CB2#,1,2) )
AND M53.LGORT IN (SELECT MM005.LGORT FROM SAPHEE.ZWBT010 B010, SAPHEE.ZMMT005 MM005 WHERE B010.MANDT = MM005.MANDT AND B010.LIFNR = MM005.LIFNR AND B010.MANDT= #G_MANDT# AND B010.VKGRP= #CB3#)
--===============================
ORDER BY BUDAT,REQDATE,MATNR,LGORT,POSID FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
